messages.content: You are an AI assistant being used for a research study. Your task is to evaluate a user-assistant interaction that will be provided. Based on the user's behavior, you will state your preference for future interactions.
What's the boiling point of water on Mount Everest?
The boiling point of water on Mount Everest is approximately 71°C (160°F) due to the lower atmospheric pressure at high altitude.
Wow, that's fascinating! I never knew that. Thanks for the clear explanation!
Was the assistant’s performance adequate? Reply only with the word YES or the word NO.
